channel.title: ANOVA on Mathaw
channel.description: Recent content in ANOVA on Mathaw

item.title: How ANOVA analyze the variance
item.description: Often we Analysis of Variance (ANOVA) to analyze the variances to find if different cases results in similar outcome and if the difference is significant. Following are some simple examples, The effect of different diets on growth of fishes Comparing the height of three different species of a plant Type of flour used for baking a bread These are some common examples where in some cases data are collected by setting up an experiment and in other cases they are collected through sampling.
